skillTree.localised_description: The war boar is a stubborn and vicious animal - an extremely tough beast that is notoriously bad tempered, loudly flatulent, unpredictable, and wholly dangerous.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee (150s)

skillTree.localised_description: Wyverns are occasionally mistaken for dragons but there is little nobility of spirit in these winged beasts, making them kindred spirits for their Orc riders.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: Tunnel bosses are Greenskins who are good at shoutin’ and hollerin’ at mobs when underground, where space and sight is an issue.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 during subterranean siege battles
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +6 during subterranean intercept battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Bellower’s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield, making sure the boyz are focused on the carnage.
The Warboss' trophy rack displays all the skulls, tusks and claws of the large beasts they've felled.
The Warboss' trophy rack houses the skulls of all the men, Dwarfs and Elfs, and myriad other beings whom he has ignominiously slaughtered.
You can’t trust ‘im. E’s a little bit woaah, a little bit Waaagh! Ya know? Well dodgy.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +10% of experience earned between all other active Lords

	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "YOU'ZE NOT DEAD 'TIL I SAYS YOU ARE!!!"

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5% for Orc units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "You scared of dem gits? I’ll give ya somefink ta be scared of!"

effects.description: Effect duration: +20% to "Get Back 'Ere!" and "Smash 'Em Faster"
Effect range: +20% to "Get Back 'Ere!" and "Smash 'Em Faster"

skillTree.localised_description: The bigger and badder the Warboss, the more boyz that will flock to his banner.
"Waaaggghhh!!!"

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Orc Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +7 for Orc Infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: It's only right and proper that the biggest, baddest, most violent Orc in a warband carries the largest, most offensive looking axe.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Orc choppas are crude and hefty blades usually swung with violent joy by their owner. A choppa in full swing can have a brutal, crunching impact on the poor fool on the receiving end.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

attributes.bullet_text: When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.

skillTree.localised_description: “Forget about da little stuff… we’s gonna get da biggest haul da tribes ever seen!”
“Get movin’ you gits! Da WAAAGH is ‘ere!

These gobbos have an air of superiority about them, using their rudimentary understanding of physics and engineering to expedite the tribe’s technological superiority. They’re very persnickety about getting their building projects just right though..

effects.description:
Construction time: +20% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: “A bit o’ dis, a bit o’ dat, grab any o’ da metal fings and slap ‘em on.”
‘Anyone who finks otherwise can zog right off.’

effects.description:
Recruitment cost: +10% for all units

skillTree.localised_description: ‘Da boss keeps all da best teef for himself. None of da boyz dare take anyfing until da boss ‘as ‘iz fill.’

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
A wise Boss knows how to lure the enemy into places where they can be ambushed or trapped with mobs that skulk in the tunnels below.
Raiders are good at marauding through enemy settlements - sending their denizens fleeing as their properties are despoiled.
Those that excel as looters make sure that every coin or gold tooth is found and added to the plunder. Woe betide the warrior that misses even a single copper token!
Ravagers are merciless - they will sack an enemy settlement, take everything and kill any that get in their way.
These iron-hard gits are particularly tough and gnarly Greenskins, who - even if wounded - will be up and ready to fight before too long.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +250 metres without incurring any time penalty
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +600 metres without incurring any time penalty
Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present
Reinforcements supporting this army can have their arrival point adjusted by +1000 metres without incurring any time penalty

skillTree.localised_description: Occasionally an Orc will come along who is more "kunning" than the rest. He quickly rises in ranks as his plans end in victory.
A Boss that has the loyalty of the mobs means he doesn’t have to worry so much about "da boring stuff" like tents and bedding, as they’ll fight for him no matter what.
Being green meanz ya really mean.
This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When you're clearly betterer than all the uvvers you need to shout the loudest, so everybody else knows you're the betterest.
"Dat a 'shroom in yer pouch? Give it! Give it to me!"

backgroundSkills.localised_description: When a Warboss needs someone to talk, he calls on this "Boy wiv da extra pointy sticks".
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +25%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
Well built, robust. Powerful.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
